assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Deirdre Weymann, Nick Dragojlovic, and Samantha Pollard report no conflicts of interest. Dean A. Regier has received travel support from Illumina to attend conferences in Boston, USA, and Barcelona, Spain.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This article does not contain any studies with human participants or animals performed by any of the authors.
